title: Bladeslinger 1.4.0[Android][Nan1977]
description:
Bladeslinger 1.4.0[Android][Nan1977]



Release date: April 18, 2013
Genre: Action
Developer: Kerosene Games
Format:. Apk, cache
Version: 1.4.0
Language: English


System requirements:
==========================

OS Version: Android 2.3 +; Processor Type: ARMv7


You play as William Glestona, a native of Peak Hammer, who returned home from the war. But on his return he found that his mother was once a flourishing town was deserted, and the streets and ubiquitous terrible monsters, which he has hitherto not seen. Only the main character is able to learn the truth, to defeat the enemy and save his city.


Setting:
==========================

1) Copy com.kerosenegames.bsep1 folder to sdcard / Android / obb

2) Install APK

3) Play!
